# Master build script for CMake (automatically generated by "mrb newDev")

# Require minimum cmake version
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED (VERSION 2.8)

# Add top level include
include_directories ( ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} )
art_make(BASENAME_ONLY
	LIBRARY_NAME CosmicRemoval
	LIB_LIBRARIES 
		     RecoBase
		     AnalysisBase
		     Geometry
		     Geometry_service
		     PhotonVisibilityService_service
		     LArProperties_service
		     OpDigiProperties_service
		     Utilities
		     ${SIMULATIONBASE}
		     ${MF_MESSAGELOGGER}
		     ${MF_UTILITIES}
		     ${FHICLCPP}
		     ${CETLIB}
		     ${CLHEP}
		     ${ROOT_BASIC_LIB_LIST}
		     ${G4_LIB_LIST}
	MODULE_LIBRARIES  
			    CosmicRemoval
			    BackTracker_service
			    RecoAlg
                            Cluster3DAlgs
			    Simulation
			    RecoObjects
			    RecoBase
			    MCBase
			    Geometry
			    Geometry_service
			    PhotonVisibilityService_service
		            OpDigiProperties_service
			    AnalysisAlg
			    AnalysisBase
                            LArProperties_service
			    DetectorProperties_service
			    Utilities
			    ${MAGNETICFIELD_SERVICE}
			    ${SIMULATIONBASE}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_CORE}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_PRINCIPAL}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_SERVICES_REGISTRY}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_SERVICES_BASIC}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_SERVICES_OPTIONAL}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_SERVICES_OPTIONAL_TFILESERVICE_SERVICE}
			    ${ART_FRAMEWORK_SERVICES_OPTIONAL_RANDOMNUMBERGENERATOR_SERVICE}
			    ${ART_PERSISTENCY_COMMON}
			    ${ART_UTILITIES}
			    ${MF_MESSAGELOGGER}
			    ${MF_UTILITIES}
			    ${FHICLCPP}
			    ${CETLIB}
			    ${CLHEP}
			    ${ROOT_BASIC_LIB_LIST}
			    ${G4_LIB_LIST}
         )

install_headers()
install_fhicl()
install_source()
